Reviews.Title: Okay for kids
Reviews.Author: MR RICHARD CUNLIFFE
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my son, aged 5.  He loves it.  The picture quality is average/low and the shutter speed is very slow - but for kids, not bad.

Reviews.Title: I used to be a professional photographer that used medium and large format camera...
Reviews.Author: Bodhi E. "B."
Reviews.Content: This thing is not a professional camera.  Don't confuse yourself there.It does take decent photographs, but the reason I bought it was for the price.  I ride a motorcycle and I wanted a camera that I could access quickly; if it were to fall out or otherwise get broken from a spill, it wouldn't be a heartbreaking loss or a financial hit.  In fact, I'll ride around with the camera dangling from the wrist strap that I attached to my glove (I ride a dual-sport and take it off-road).  I had gotten tired of digging out my phone to take a picture, especially during the rainy days common to my region.  And this thing has a flash; it takes a while for the flash to warm up but it works.  The camera itself comes up and is ready to use within a few seconds of turning it on - and has several features that I wasn't expecting from a camera in this price range.I'm considering buying a second to have on hand as backup.In short, I treat this thing as a disposable camera and it's exceeded it's expectations.  I would recommend it as such, or even as a first camera for your young aspiring photographer.  I wish only that it had an optical zoom.

Reviews.Title: simple, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Lance C
Reviews.Content: If you want a basic, decently sturdy digital camera that won't confuse the crap out of you, buy this. enough said.

Reviews.Title: bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: terry keefer
Reviews.Content: we bought this camera for my 12 yr old as a Christmas gift and she loves it. Great for a budding photographer.

Reviews.Title: Terrible camera - complete rip off!
Reviews.Author: P. Breakfield IV "Tom Steele"
Reviews.Content: What a horrible waste of money. I got this for my daughter and honestly I would have been better off with a fisher price camera. It would take better pictures. I really don't know how they get away with a camera this bad. I promise you that any cellphone would take better pictures than this camera. Avoid vivitar like plague!

Reviews.Title: point and shoot
Reviews.Author: archie10
Reviews.Content: I would only get this camera to give away.  the software doesn't load correctly, there are *NO* drivers I can find anywhere on line and vivitar won't answer emails.

Reviews.Title: Low Quality
Reviews.Author: Bernard Gant
Reviews.Content: Low quality photos with the biggest problem being the fact that you must hold it steady up until you see the completed photo in the screen. If you fail to do so, the photo is blurry.

Reviews.Title: Cute
Reviews.Author: Rafael Lopez
Reviews.Content: This was a cute purchase It is a fair product for the price and received in a reasonable amount of time. It isn't the fanciest of cameras but it is functional

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Jean H Allen
Reviews.Content: Pictures turn out clear as a bell  and as I said--easy to use'  Fits cofortably in my hands.  Not at all clumsy

Reviews.Title: Horrendous image, worst quality
Reviews.Author: Mario J. Fachler
Reviews.Content: I have seeing bad products, terrible products, horrendous products, and this camera.10.1 MP ?  My 6 years old phone has a better image.Quality ?  It broke 2 days after the return window expired.A complete rip off.

Reviews.Title: Great "cheap" camera
Reviews.Author: Simmy
Reviews.Content: I purchased it knowing it was a cheap camera, but I was pleasantly surprised with the photos it took-- it is small but easy to hold steady so the pictures are clear.  You cannot recharge the batteries so it might get expensive over the long run, but it was purchased for a special event and that will not affect me.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Luke F. Varvel
Reviews.Content: Very cheap feel. Very slow zoom in and out. Blurry photos. No rechargeable battery. Not worth it. Spend a little more and get something decent.

Reviews.Title: Never worked
Reviews.Author: vellankinator "Vellankinator"
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift for a kid. Took it to my country and opened the package and loaded the batteries. Voila I see a glazed screen preceded by a weird zzzzz noise. By the time I came back the return time expired. Stupid of me not to know that I get what I pay for.

Reviews.Title: OMG
Reviews.Author: dk
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrible. It is cheaply made and does not take good pictures. Will not recommend camera to anyone

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for........
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Molina
Reviews.Content: Worst camera I have ever bought.........don't waste your money. But, I guess the price should have warned me. I should have expected it.

Reviews.Title: not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Robert451
Reviews.Content: worked for a few pics and quit with a scrambled screen too much effort to return buyer beware my loss

Reviews.Title: dont buy
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Pagano "msmamap"
Reviews.Content: piece of junk.  I thought the price was to good to be true.  It was a piece of plastic garbage. dont buy

ProductInfo.Features:
4x Digital Zoom
Auto Flash and Red eye detection
Continuous Shooting
2.0" Preview Screen
Anti Shake
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar VX020-RED Vivicam 10.1 MP HD Digital Camera - Red
